timeline.message:
Replace usage of Verify.assertThrows() by Assert.assertThrows().

Signed-off-by: Nikhil Nanivadekar <nikhil.nanivadekar@bnymellon.com>

timeline.bodyText: Suggestion to make this Assert.assertThrows instead of a static import, so it is consistent with the rest of the assertions in this class. Same comment for lines 331 and 495.
timeline.author: prathasirisha

replies.bodyText: We have other such instances where we us static import. I dont understand the consistency aspect here. That said, I have fixed it.
replies.author: nikhilnanivadekar

timeline.author: donraab

replies.bodyText: How does that matter in this test? This test is deprecated as well.
replies.author: nikhilnanivadekar

timeline.author: donraab

replies.bodyText: How does that matter in a test?
replies.author: nikhilnanivadekar

timeline.author: motlin

replies.bodyText: This was fixed in a subsequent commit.
replies.author: nikhilnanivadekar
